articles.title: Before Tiger 3, Salman Khan’s spy games began as a goofy love story - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Ek Tha Tiger, among the earliest Bollywood spy films to do roaring business, was almost light-hearted. Something changed by the time Tiger Zinda Hai released five years later. Ten years on, that self-serious vein is again in evidence in Tiger 3.
